enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve manipulating the internal state of the Options object, specifically the longOpts map.
Both methods involve adding or querying options based on their names, which can be used to set up the test environment.
Both methods involve querying the longOpts map and can be used to construct assertions for the matching options.
Both methods involve querying options based on their names and can be used to verify the correctness of the matching options.
